ing: 1 tablespoon chocolate chips, or to taste
des: "I whipped this up after school one day when I wanted peanut butter and a healthy snack. There are many other toppings that can be used with this such as NutellaÂ®, extra peanut butter, granola, fruit, oats, graham crackers, cookies, or cereal. The possibilities are endless!"
ins:
Microwave peanut butter in a microwave-safe bowl until liquid and smooth, about 20 seconds.
Stir Greek yogurt into the peanut butter with a spoon until smooth, scraping off any peanut butter stuck to the spoon. Stir in stevia and vanilla extract. Fold in chocolate chips.
